title: What's new in version 1.4.0
text:
Hashrate now supports Alephium through HeroMiners pool! This update also brings the following improvements:

• Flux support in HeroMiners
• Monero support in HeroMiners
• Interface improvements and bug fixes

title: What's new in version 1.3.3
text:
Full Hiveon Pool support is finally here! This version also fixes the following bugs:

• iOS 14 crash on startup
• iPadOS crash on some devices
